summary: This bill, the "No Official Giveaways Of Taxpayers’ Income to Oppressive Nations Act" (NO GOTION Act), amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny green energy tax benefits to companies associated with foreign adversaries. It defines "disqualified companies" based on ownership, control, influence, or debt arrangements with foreign adversaries, specifically including governments, agencies, and entities from those nations. The bill also includes specific definitions for "foreign adversary" and provides the Secretary of the Treasury the authority to issue guidance and prevent circumvention. The amendments apply to taxable years beginning after the enactment of the law.
